thread.title: Friendly faces and good customer service
thread.title_full: Friendly faces and good customer service - Review of Gardens NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Hocawine
title: Friendly faces and good customer service
text:
I have stayed in this hotel several times now and each time I have been very pleased. The location is great, the rooms are clean and big for NY and the staff is very nice. This is not a fancy, over-the-top NYC hotel, but it is everything you need without the nice, but unnecessary, pomp. Extra thanks to Joseph, who's service was highly professional and courteous.
Room Tip: High floor is quieter See more room tips
